description: This table represents the audit trail for team-based actions taken for a patient.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: TEAM_AUDIT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Provider Care Team associated with this team audit line.

columns.name: TEAM_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID of the action taken for this line of the team audit.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Add


Remove


Update

columns.name: PRIMARYTEAM_AUDI_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this line of the team audit shows that the team was the primary team.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: CONTACT_AUDIT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the provider who is the primary contact for the patient in the audit line. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: TEAMAUDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user responsible for adding the audit line. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: TEAM_AUDIT_INSTANT
columns.description: The instant when the audit line was added.
